name: UpsertAirtableRecords
description:
Update or insert records in an Airtable HyperDB table.

Use this tool to update or insert records in an Airtable HyperDB table by matching primary keys. Ideal for syncing data or ensuring records are up-to-date without manual oversight.

parameters.name: enterprise_account_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the Airtable enterprise account. Required for accessing the HyperDB table.

parameters.name: data_table_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the HyperDB data table in Airtable. Required for targeting the specific table for upsert operations.

parameters.name: records_to_upsert
parameters.description: JSON array of records to upsert, each with a unique primaryKey and associated fields.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
